g.text: * Configure bridge network for two-nodes communication ( HOST-A and HOST-B)
- Host-A and Host-B are running on KVM hypervisor.
- This is the idea to setup nested virtualization to communicate Host-A to
- Host-A can manage through Host-B and VMs inside Host-B.
- Host-A will use Ansible, Jenkins, BashScript to manage Host-B and its VMs.
└── [L1] Host A (Manage as an Infra Node)
nmcli connection add type bridge con-name br0 ifname br0
nmcli connection add type ethernet con-name br0-port ifname enp7s0 master br0
nmcli connection modify br0 ipv4.method manual
(Conntainerized jenkins also running as roothless container with persistent mode)
